short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All the links a broodling will ever need!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension, designed for all massives, broodlings, and students of Bigideas, is created to aid them on their weary travels through the dregs of media. It contains links to the EFAP websites, random videos, and more!
